title: Train worker who saved passengers from stabbings leaves hospital
description: Samir Zitouni's family say they are "really happy" but that he faces a significant recovery.
content:
A rail worker credited with saving multiple lives during a mass stabbing on a train has been discharged from hospital.
Samir Zitouni was a member of the catering crew on the Doncaster to London King's Cross service on the evening of 1 November when a... [1476 chars]

title: Rail worker who protected passengers during mass stabbing on Huntingdon train discharged from hospital
description: Samir Zitouni was described as "incredibly brave" by the managing director of LNER after he was seriously injured trying to protect passengers during the attack.
content:
The train crew member who was seriously injured while trying to protect passengers during a mass stabbing has been discharged from hospital.

title: Fantastic Ford steers battling England past All Blacks in Twickenham thriller
description: England stormed back from 12-0 down against New Zealand to claim a historic 33-19 victory against the All Blacks and secure their 10th successive win
content: A perfect 10 wins in a row is a reliable indicator of a team on the rise. What England really craved, though, was a statement victory to underline just how far they have come in the past 18 months or so. And on a dull grey November afternoon they fin... [4619 chars]

title: Lauren Hemp: How dazzling Manchester City winger can boost their WSL title hopes
description: When you are already top of the WSL table and are able to recall a fully fit Lauren Hemp, you know you are in a strong position.
content:

title: Arsenal handed scare as Gabriel injured in Brazil friendly against Senegal at the Emirates
description: Arsenal face Tottenham, Bayern Munich and Chelsea in a tricky fixture run after the international break
content:
Arsenal were hit by a major injury worry as key defender Gabriel Magalhaes limped out of Brazil’s 2-0 friendly win against Senegal at the Emirates Stadium.
